CustomField.formula: IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Renewal Reminder' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'MKP' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Cuti Premi' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Lapse TM' )&& TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'Approved',APE_Convert__c,IF(Call_List__r.RecordType.Name=='Collection AMFS' && (TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Redemption Konven' || TEXT(Call_List__r.Case_Type_Config__c) == 'Withdrawal') && TEXT(Call_Status_Config__c)== 'P',APE_Convert__c,0))
CustomField.label: Amount Approved
